
---
title: '可叠万券：京东 PLUS 超级补贴开领，洗鞋仅需 9.9 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯

author: IT 之家

date: Sat, 11 Dec 2021 07:49:33 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/12/c8f28252-02b9-4c18-99ef-806d1e76607c.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="61e4">京东 PLUS 会员双 12 超级补贴也现已开放，可领 5000-400 元、2000-160 元、1200-100 元、300-30 元、600-50 元超级补贴券，<span class="accentTextColor">可叠加万券使用</span>：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAPsJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwQLFRUDdQ1jayQIezlzG31UJgw5dT5xahRDWScLBVlXABdCUQ5LXmFbSwhBAHRbBAECXBYbRipNE2tJA0VkElw_Syt1eQ98BStNJ2BJVh89BEcnAGgBElwlXgQFVlhZDUgQMwxvdQFRJXNYEDU1OEkWBm4JE2teMwcyVFpYDUIWA2cPHWsVWgQKV19UD04UAGoNK1sdWjZeFgwcSnsnM2w4K2sUbQUyCjBcW00VA2xcHDVPFAZaDFxbVSUSB2gIElwdbQQDVVxfOA" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAPwJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwQLFRUDdQ1jayQIezlzG31UJgw5dT5xahRDWScLBVlXABdCUQ5LXmFbSwhBAHRbBAECXBYbRipNE2tWAWJQMgsJUiliXy1_fyxrKkQCXB4LBEcnAG4KH1oUXgcCU25eCkwVBWsNGFwlPmFsDholfRFTaAc4G14lFmgDZF5eD08VBmcIG18lXQEAXF1cAUwSAG0NE2sVVQEyCBwPSQknM18LK2slXDYBZAAzCRgXAz8PTw97B08CDAZfWBx5BmwPH1oWWzYAVV9fCns" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="a65e">“全品券”可与头号京贴、店铺东券、满减活动、京享红包叠加，<span class="accentTextColor">按照平行优惠规则使用。</span></p><p data-vmark="7cf1">“PLUS 会员超级补贴券”可与头号京贴、全品类东券、限品类东券、店铺东券、满减活动、京享红包叠加，<span class="accentTextColor">按照平行优惠规则使用。</span></p><h2 data-vmark="2a6c"><span class="accentTextColor">京东 PLUS 超级补贴示例</span></h2><p data-vmark="3eca"><span
